post.text: Words of advice from the 1969 Wellesley College commencement speaker: Hillary Rodham. IWillVote.com

comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: Hillary has proven she is a liar, and could care less about our borders, she wants to take away our guns and she approves on murdering our children all she is concerned with is stuffing her pockets with money,, she doesn't belong in the White House, she belongs in the big house. I say Hillary for Prison.

replies.author: Annalee
replies.text: You ought to be ashamed of yourself to wish HILLARY for Prison. You are not smart man.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Annalee do you know the body count of Hillary illegal activities?
